reviews.text: Beautiful Cathedral 162 years old being tastily restored😉
Beautiful but unbelievablely cold

Well worth a visit
One of the oldest Cathedrals around
Very well maintained
Well worth a visit , food excellent well presented, staff,nothing seems to be a problem to them.

The cathedral for the diocese of Ossory. Well worth a visit for anybody interested in religious architecture, it was built in 1847, a recent edition was the installation of a gold ceiling above the altar. Otherwise it's a fully functioning Cathedral hosting masses, weddings, funerals, confirmations and confessions etc.

Love walking into a Starbucks and smelling the fresh coffee. This location was clean and the staff friendly. Coffee was made to order and correctly made for this picky coffee drinker lol. This spot has an area for when you are wanting to socialize or break out the computer/books and do some studying while sipping on a latte. Only problem I seen was the drive through and parking area are very tight but couldn't take a star away just for that. Keep it up at this location cause my little girl and I will definitely be back for our coffee.
Always fast, friendly, and informative! Their coffee is great and their snacks are always yummy! Mobile pickup through their app is always very convenient as well!

Yummy but prices need to stop going up, they  are beyond being a very successful business that has millions of people addicted and stopping for ine of their many yummy beverages and foods almost every day like its crack, stop being greedy with the cost increase of everything, PLEASE. I want to be able to afford my coffee "crack" lol just playing, kinda. Attention there's no illegal drugs served at any Starbucks facility
... that I'm aware of!
Very friendly service. Got the order correct. Fast.
Rude, impersonal staff, slow service, dirty restrooms. The food is blah, you get better quality food at much lower prices at McDonalds or any of the other fast food chains in the area.
Pretty decent  & tasty meals for $7 a dish. there's English menu..  Lots of international tourist here. friendly l staff.. a bit too salty yakisoba ..
combination of local food & western dishes on the menu, the price are reasonable too.

Fantastic place to eat, food was delicious and the waitress we had was extremely helpful and attentive to our table.

Wide choice of food and menu was readable in English. Smoking and none smoking areas are in the same room, with no barrier between, however we sat in the none smoking area and the air conditioning seemed to take care of the smell of smoke.

Good food and reasonably priced with great staff.
Food here are awesome and half a price from outside!! Come with several choice and the beer are Power Pac, good to try.

Slow service, took ages after table was ready to order before waiting staff attended and even that seemed like a fluke, chicken sticks had cartledge strewn through them. Beef dish was nice but a little salty however.
We've had beautiful meals in fantastic places served by the friendliest staff on our trip to Japan - this place however is NOT one on that list.
Love the place, great food. I recommend the noodles with peanut sauce for sure and all dim sum was great overall.

It's too busy... They won't give you the attention the focus your looking for. 

I was disappointed.
Loved the Xiao long bao (plain pork) ! Very delicious, especially the chocolate ones, which I highly recommend!

The place that could never be wrong when you're in a delicacy hunger. Their services staff are at least 4 levels/types and the food is typical Cantonese cuisine. The crab one is a can't miss, seasonal seafood is a nice surprise.

Great place for Chinese dumplings and other dishes. The restaurant is on the expensive side as for Chinese pricing but it is well worth it. The management speaks English also so it is easy to communicate. Menu's are clear and with pictures so you can also pick and choose what to eat. Great for both locals and foreigners.

How can fried dough taste so good?  Great staff.  Quick and friendly service!  Bring a bib or just don't care like everyone else.  There is so much powder sugar your gonna make, but nobody cares because it taste so good.  They have two lines one for take out one for eat in, the lines are long but move quickly.

Very delicious, both hot chocolate & coffee were perfect! You do seat yourself upon arrival, I recommend during busy times to just sit at a table that may still need to be cleaned if needed. Service comes fairly quickly & they cleaned our table & then took our order very kindly. It is cash only, so be prepared, I think the closest ATM was across the street. Overall, pleasant experience, however be prepared to wait during peak hours of the day. We went during a rainy evening & had little to no wait.

This is a requisite stop for New Orleans. We went very late at night but this place was still pretty active at midnight. Service at that time was very good, as soon as we sat down a waiter came and took our order. Food and drinks came within 5 minutes. I give the place 3 stars because while the beignets and coffee were very good, I didn't find them any different than any of the other places that offered them. However I still recommend coming for the experience and to see the world famous Cafe Du Monde.

Absolutely loved Cafe Du Monde. It's a huge tourist attraction so the wait can be long, however we visited for a morning brunch and got seated in just a few minutes. The Beignets are truly to die for! The hype is real! All that fluffy sugar goodness takes you straight to heaven!

Go to the original find an available seat  and be ready to order.  One of the few touristy things in life that meet expectations but then again its coffee and donuts.  However, both very good and the atmosphere is amazing.  Set close to the street if you can and enjoy the performers.
nice place with delicious meal
Fast and cheap local restaurant
Fast and convenience, taste good, 24 hours

Fast, clean and good. You can eat as much rice as you want and that is a big plus. I'd
 recommend しょうが焼き定食。

Food tasted good, atmosphere was modern & nice, and you help yourself to as much tea, water, and white rice as you want. Plus, the prices were good & they have an English option on their machine that you order from.
